attribute.value: Gridded Emission Inventory for the Permian Basin Based on Bottom-up Information

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Gridded Bottom-up Emission Inventory for the Permian Basin (27-36N, 108-98W) on GEOS-Chem 0.25 x 0.3125 grid. 1. We start from gridded EPA methane emission inventory (Maasakkers et al., ES&T 2016), which is for year 2012; 2. We extrapolate oil/gas production emissions to 2018 using 2018 Drillinginfo data (well count, well completion, and production) to reflect changes in oil/gas emission activities; 3. We further scale subsectorial production emissions using the ratio between GHGI (2019) and GHGI (2016) for 2013 emissions to account for changes in national average emission factor.
